page.title: 16Employment
page.content: We asked two classes in our school (Ashington C.E. School) where their {fathers}worked,these were the results: Ashington 11; Horsham 9; Crawley 7; Shoreham 4; Gatwick 3; London 3; Storrington 3; and Billingshurst, Brighton, Cranleigh, Littlehampton, Partridge Green, Southwater, Thakeham all with one as well as one abroad. 31 travelled to work by car, 14 by van 1 by motor bike, only 1 walked! Twenty-six{mothers}worked in Ashington, this includes running a business from home and seasonal fruit picking. A large percentage work at the Linfield mushroom farm. Four work in Storrington, 3 Pulborough, 2 Worthing, 1 Findon, 1 Horsham, 1 Steyning, and one at Warnham. Twenty- seven travelled by car, some get a lift, 5 by van, 3 cycle and one walks. Seven mothers didn't go to work.
